Module javaNeuralNetwork.main
Package neural_network.learning

Class Learner

java.lang.Object
neural_network.learning.Learner
Direct Known Subclasses:
Trainer
public abstract class Learner extends Object
Base class for Trainer, Validator and Tester.

  • Constructor Details

    • Learner

      public Learner(Network network, NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> data, int batchSize, boolean weighted, int numBins)
      General constructor method (with possibility of weighted partition).
      Parameters:
      network - The neural network to train.
      data - All the data to be passed to the network.
      batchSize - The number of datapoints per batch for an epoch.
      weighted - If true then we use the WeightedPartitioner, else we use the Partitioner.
      numBins - If weighted is true and the network is a regressor, then we need to specify the number of bins for the WeightedPartitioner. Otherwise, this parameter is ignored.

    • Learner

      public Learner(Network network, NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> data, int batchSize)
      Constructor for non-weighted partitions.
      Parameters:
      network - The neural network to train.
      data - All the data to be passed to the network.
      batchSize - The number of datapoints per batch for an epoch.

  • Method Details

    • forwardPassOneBatch

      double forwardPassOneBatch(List<Integer> batchIds)
      Performs the forward pass through the network for one batch of the data.
      Parameters:
      batchIds - The random list of ids for the current batch.
      Returns:
      The total loss of the batch (to keep track).

    • storeGradients

      void storeGradients(int id)
      To be overridden by a Trainer, but will not be touched by the Validator or Tester.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the current datapoint.

    • run

      public abstract void run()
      Performs training/validation/testing

    • updateCategoricalDataframe

      void updateCategoricalDataframe()
      Update the categorical dataframe with yHat data but using the original categories from the data - to be used for plotting and outputs to the user. Note that this method will be called after training/testing/validation is complete so that the yHat values are fully updated.

    • getNetwork

      Network getNetwork()
      Getter for network. For subclasses.
      Returns:
      The network.

    • isRegressor

      boolean isRegressor()
      Getter for doRegression. For subclasses.
      Returns:
      If true then we are regressing, else we are classifying.
